Classes in org.gridlab.gridsphere.services.file.tasks used by org.gridlab.gridsphere.services.file
FileBrowser
          Describes an interface for "browsing" file systems on hardware resoruces that are made available by file resources.
FileBrowserService
          Describes a service for performing file browsing tasks.
 

Classes in org.gridlab.gridsphere.services.file.tasks used by org.gridlab.gridsphere.services.file.logical

Classes in org.gridlab.gridsphere.services.file.tasks used by org.gridlab.gridsphere.services.file.logical.impl

          Describes an interface for "browsing" file systems on hardware resoruces that are made available by file resources.

          Describes a service for performing file browsing tasks.

          Describes a file browser task.
FileBrowserTaskSpec
          Describes a file browser task specification.
FileCopy
          Describes a task for copying a set of files to a file location.
FileCopySpec
          Describes a file copy task to perform.
FileDeletion
          Describes a task for deleting a set of files.
FileDeletionSpec
          Specifies a a task for deleting a set of files.
FileDownload
          Describes a task to download a remote file to a local location.
FileDownloadSpec
          Describes a file transfer task to perform.
FileListing
          Describes a task for listing files at a file location.
FileListingSpec
          Describes a file listing task to perform.
FileMakeDir
          Describes a task for making a dir at a file location.
FileMakeDirSpec
          Describes a make directory task to perform.
FileMove
          Describes a task for moving a file set to a file location.
FileMoveSpec
          Describes a file move task to perform.
FileNameChange
          Describes a task for changing the file name of a file object at a specified file location to a specified file name.
FileNameChangeSpec
          Describes a file name change task to perform.
FileUpload
          Describes a task to upload a local file to a remote location.
FileUploadSpec
          Describes a file transfer task to perform.
